title: Shaolin State of Harmony
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: A small vegan and raw food restaurant located inside the Shaolin Cultural Centre of Milan. Offers dishes prepared with fresh organic produce. It's also lounge bar serving non-alcoholic drinks, a tearoom, and sells various vegan food products. Since June 2015.
